title: Fix character count progress bars to update instantly on typing

requirements.text: Update CreateChatroomDialog component to calculate character count percentage directly during render instead of using useEffect, ensuring the progress bar for topic input updates instantly as the user types

quotes: fix the character count progress bars across all components
